description: The Japanese barberry (Berberis thunbergii 'Talago' SUNJOY GOLD BERET) is an amazing and versatile plant species ideal for a range of landscaping needs. It has a striking golden yellow foliage that adds visual interest to a garden, and when planted in large groups can provide a vibrant, eye-catching display. Its dense upright growth pattern makes it a great choice for hedging and barriers, as the barberry has excellent wind tolerant properties. Plus, its low-maintenance nature ensures it's easy to care for, requiring little pruning. Its hardiness and near invulnerability to disease and insects make it an ideal choice for an array of gardens and settings.
